resources.string: Volume remote control is enabled. Connect to below address from another device to start controlling sound volume remotely.
Volume remote control is disabled. You must activate it first before you can control sound volume remotely.
Remote volume control will remain accessible after you close this window.
Verify that you are connected to your local network (Wifi).
This application limits itself to local network IP addresses (192.168.*.*, 10.*.*.*, or 172.16.0.0 to 172.31.255.255).
Volume remote control is disabled. Unable to find a local network IP address.
